finding that {{champion:6}} is champ that can be played in any position but is effective in none. Needs a more direct application of theme because right now he's neither bruiser nor artillery. having the weaknesses of both and the strength of neither> not having the sustained power to be an anti-tank
Can we please have a {{champion:44}} update? I mean, he's outdated more than old {{champion:15}}.

That's the point, silly.  They update him so he becomes relevant and more played.  'Sides, he's actually really good, his stun is powerful as heck if you can use it well.
I'm pretty sure Riot said they're in the process of a Taric rework, and are even thinking about adding a Charm mechanic to him.

Himmmm, i would really like it if Alistair did more damage. ap or ad i think it would work in making him a better top/jungle opponent and this would bring a good new feature into the game {{champion:12}} :)

I agree, he is all about damage he is all about bringing cc to the table and soaking up a lot of damage
